capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to change file ownership arbitrarily
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to bypass file permission checks
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to bypass permission checks for file operations
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to use raw and packet sockets
capabilities.name: NET_RAW

capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to change group ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Minecraft is able to change user ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETUID

app_metadata.description:
Minecraft dedicated server for Java platform hosts a world for multiplayer game.
Players can join the server using the Java client on Desktops.
app_metadata.name: minecraft
app_metadata.title: Minecraft Server (Java)

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Minecraft

attrs.label: EULA
attrs.description: The EULA for Minecraft

attrs.label: Image Selector
attrs.description: The image selector for Minecraft

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
The type of Minecraft server to run.</br>
Depending on the type you select, you might need
to add additional environment variables. </br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/server-types/bukkit-spigot

attrs.label: Version
attrs.description:
The minecraft version.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/versions/minecraft

attrs.label: Game Mode
attrs.description:
The game mode of the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/gamemode

attrs.label: Server Name
attrs.description:
The name of the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/servername

attrs.label: Difficulty
attrs.description:
The difficulty of the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/difficulty

attrs.label: Seed
attrs.description:
The seed for the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/seed </br>
(Quotes is handled by the field automatically)

attrs.label: Level Type
attrs.description:
The level type of the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/#level-type-and-generator-settings

attrs.label: Message of the Day
attrs.description:
The message of the day for the Minecraft server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/motd

attrs.label: Enable RCON
attrs.description:
Enable RCON for the Minecraft server.</br>
It is recommended to keep this enabled, as it helps to
shut down the minecraft server gracefully.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/rcon

attrs.label: RCON Password
attrs.description: The RCON password for the Minecraft server.

attrs.label: Max Players
attrs.description:
The maximum number of players that can join the server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/maxplayers

attrs.label: Max World Size
attrs.description:
The maximum possible size in blocks, expressed as a radius.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/maxworldsize

attrs.label: Max Build Height
attrs.description:
The maximum height in which building is allowed.
Terrain may still naturally generate above a low height limit.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/maxbuildheight

attrs.label: Allow Nether
attrs.description:
Allows players to travel to the Nether.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/allownether

attrs.label: Announce Player Achievements
attrs.description:
Allows server to announce when a player gets an achievement.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/announceachievements

attrs.label: Enable Command Block
attrs.description:
Enables the command blocks.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/enablecommandblock

attrs.label: Force Game Mode
attrs.description:
Force players to join in the default game mode.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/forcegamemode

attrs.label: Generate Structures
attrs.description:
Defines whether structures (such as villages) will be generated.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/generatestructures

attrs.label: Hardcore
attrs.description:
If set to true, players will be set to spectator mode if they die.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/hardcore

attrs.label: Spawn Animals
attrs.description:
Determines if animals will be able to spawn.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/spawnanimals

attrs.label: Spawn NPCs
attrs.description:
Determines if villagers will be spawned.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/spawnnpcs

attrs.label: Spawn Monsters
attrs.description:
Determines if monsters will be spawned.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/spawnmonsters

attrs.label: Spawn Protection
attrs.description:
The radius of the spawn protection.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/spawnprotection

attrs.label: PVP
attrs.description:
Determines if PVP will be enabled.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/pvp

attrs.label: Allow Flight
attrs.description:
Allows users to use flight on your server while in Survival mode,
if they have a mod that provides flight installed.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/allowflight

attrs.label: View Distance
attrs.description:
Sets the amount of world data the server sends the client,
measured in chunks in each direction of the player (radius, not diameter).
It determines the server-side viewing distance.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/viewdistance

attrs.label: Online Mode
attrs.description:
If set to true, the server will attempt to authenticate clients
connecting to it with the Minecraft account database.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/onlinemode

attrs.label: Max Tick Time
attrs.description:
The maximum number of milliseconds a single tick may take
before the server watchdog stops the server with the message,
A single server tick took 60.00 seconds (should be max 0.05);
Considering it to be crashed, server will forcibly shutdown.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/maxticktime

attrs.label: Operators / Administrators
attrs.description:
A list of player names who should be considered operators.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/ops

attrs.label: Whitelist
attrs.description:
A list of player names who are allowed to play on the server.</br>
https://itzg.github.io/docker-minecraft-docs/java/configuration/whitelist

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Minecraft files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Minecraft files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Minecraft Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Minecraft Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Containers
attrs.description: Containers where the label should be applied

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for Minecraft.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for Minecraft.

1.13.13.readme:
Minecraft

Minecraft is a sandbox game

Depending on the Type of server selected, you might need to add additional custom environment variables to the application.

More info can be found here Select the type on the sidebar.

Note that some values are only applicable during the world generation. More info can be found here
